summary: This module implements Prefect notification blocks built on the Apprise library, offering a unified interface for sending messages to many external services. It defines an abstract notification block handling templating, secret management, and async/sync execution, and concrete blocks for popular platforms such as Slack, Discord, Microsoft Teams, Mattermost, Opsgenie, PagerDuty, Sendgrid email, Twilio SMS, and a generic custom webhook.
business_intent: Enable Prefect users to configure, store, and reuse notification settings for a wide range of thirdâ€‘party communication services, allowing workflows to emit alerts, status updates, or messages in a consistent and secure manner.
